39 #include <moveit/task_constructor/stages/connect.h>

46 
47 Connect::Connect(const std::string& name, const GroupPlannerVector& planners) : Connecting(name), planner_(planners) {
48  setTimeout(1.0);
49  auto& p = properties();
50  p.declare<MergeMode>("merge_mode", WAYPOINTS, "merge mode");
51  p.declare<moveit_msgs::Constraints>("path_constraints", moveit_msgs::Constraints(),
52  "constraints to maintain during trajectory");
53 }
54 
55 void Connect::reset() {
56  Connecting::reset();
57  merged_jmg_.reset();
58  subsolutions_.clear();
59  states_.clear();
60 }
61 
62 void Connect::init(const core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model) {
63  Connecting::init(robot_model);
64 
65  InitStageException errors;
66  if (planner_.empty())
67  errors.push_back(*this, "empty set of groups");
68 
69  size_t num_joints = 0;
70  std::vector<const moveit::core::JointModelGroup*> groups;
71  for (const GroupPlannerVector::value_type& pair : planner_) {
72  if (!robot_model->hasJointModelGroup(pair.first))
73  errors.push_back(*this, "invalid group: " + pair.first);
74  else if (!pair.second)
75  errors.push_back(*this, "invalid planner for group: " + pair.first);
76  else {
77  pair.second->init(robot_model);
78 
79  auto jmg = robot_model->getJointModelGroup(pair.first);
80  groups.push_back(jmg);
81  num_joints += jmg->getJointModels().size();
82  }
83  }
84 
85  if (!errors && groups.size() >= 2) { // enable merging?
86  try {
87  merged_jmg_.reset();
88  merged_jmg_.reset(task_constructor::merge(groups));
89  } catch (const std::runtime_error& e) {
90  ROS_INFO_STREAM_NAMED("Connect", this->name() << ": " << e.what() << ". Disabling merging.");
91  }
92  }
93 
94  if (errors)
95  throw errors;
96 }
97 
98 bool Connect::compatible(const InterfaceState& from_state, const InterfaceState& to_state) const {
99  if (!Connecting::compatible(from_state, to_state))
100  return false;
101 
102  const moveit::core::RobotState& from = from_state.scene()->getCurrentState();
103  const moveit::core::RobotState& to = to_state.scene()->getCurrentState();
104 
105  // compose set of joint names we plan for
106  std::set<std::string> planned_joint_names;
107  for (const GroupPlannerVector::value_type& pair : planner_) {
108  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = from.getJointModelGroup(pair.first);
109  const auto& names = jmg->getJointModelNames();
110  planned_joint_names.insert(names.begin(), names.end());
111  }
112  // all active joints that we don't plan for should match
113  for (const moveit::core::JointModel* jm : from.getRobotModel()->getJointModels()) {
114  if (planned_joint_names.count(jm->getName()))
115  continue; // ignore joints we plan for
116 
117  const unsigned int num = jm->getVariableCount();
118  Eigen::Map<const Eigen::VectorXd> positions_from(from.getJointPositions(jm), num);
119  Eigen::Map<const Eigen::VectorXd> positions_to(to.getJointPositions(jm), num);
120  if (!(positions_from - positions_to).isZero(1e-4)) {
121  ROS_INFO_STREAM_NAMED("Connect", "Deviation in joint " << jm->getName() << ": [" << positions_from.transpose()
122  << "] != [" << positions_to.transpose() << "]");
123  return false;
124  }
125  }
126  return true;
127 }
128 
129 void Connect::compute(const InterfaceState& from, const InterfaceState& to) {
130  const auto& props = properties();
131  double timeout = this->timeout();
132  MergeMode mode = props.get<MergeMode>("merge_mode");
133  const auto& path_constraints = props.get<moveit_msgs::Constraints>("path_constraints");
134 
135  const moveit::core::RobotState& final_goal_state = to.scene()->getCurrentState();
136  std::vector<robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryConstPtr> sub_trajectories;
137 
138  std::vector<planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr> intermediate_scenes;
139  planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr start = from.scene();
140  intermediate_scenes.push_back(start);
141 
142  bool success = false;
143  std::vector<double> positions;
144  for (const GroupPlannerVector::value_type& pair : planner_) {
145  // set intermediate goal state
146  planning_scene::PlanningScenePtr end = start->diff();
147  const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* jmg = final_goal_state.getJointModelGroup(pair.first);
148  final_goal_state.copyJointGroupPositions(jmg, positions);
149  robot_state::RobotState& goal_state = end->getCurrentStateNonConst();
150  goal_state.setJointGroupPositions(jmg, positions);
151  goal_state.update();
152  intermediate_scenes.push_back(end);
153 
154  robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryPtr trajectory;
155  success = pair.second->plan(start, end, jmg, timeout, trajectory, path_constraints);
156  sub_trajectories.push_back(trajectory); // include failed trajectory
157 
158  if (!success)
159  break;
160 
161  // continue from reached state
162  start = end;
163  }
164 
165  SolutionBasePtr solution;
166  if (success && mode != SEQUENTIAL) // try to merge
167  solution = merge(sub_trajectories, intermediate_scenes, from.scene()->getCurrentState());
168  if (!solution) // success == false or merging failed: store sequentially
169  solution = makeSequential(sub_trajectories, intermediate_scenes, from, to);
170  if (!success) // error during sequential planning
171  solution->markAsFailure();
172  connect(from, to, solution);
173 }
174 
175 SolutionSequencePtr
176 Connect::makeSequential(const std::vector<robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryConstPtr>& sub_trajectories,
177  const std::vector<planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr>& intermediate_scenes,
178  const InterfaceState& from, const InterfaceState& to) {
179  assert(sub_trajectories.size() + 1 == intermediate_scenes.size());
180  auto scene_it = intermediate_scenes.begin();
181  planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr start_ps = *scene_it;
182  const InterfaceState* state = &from;
183 
184  // calculate cost
185  double cost = 0;
186  for (const auto& trajectory : sub_trajectories) {
187  if (!trajectory)
188  continue;
189  for (const double& distance : trajectory->getWayPointDurations())
190  cost += distance;
191  }
192 
193  SolutionSequence::container_type sub_solutions;
194  for (const auto& sub : sub_trajectories) {
195  planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr end_ps = *++scene_it;
196 
197  auto inserted = subsolutions_.insert(subsolutions_.end(), SubTrajectory(sub));
198  inserted->setCreator(pimpl_);
199  // push back solution pointer
200  sub_solutions.push_back(&*inserted);
201 
202  // provide meaningful start/end states
203  subsolutions_.back().setStartState(*state);
204 
205  // for all but last scene, create a new state
206  if (sub_solutions.size() < sub_trajectories.size()) {
207  state = &*states_.insert(states_.end(), InterfaceState(end_ps));
208  subsolutions_.back().setEndState(*state);
209  } else
210  subsolutions_.back().setEndState(to);
211 
212  start_ps = end_ps;
213  }
214 
215  return std::make_shared<SolutionSequence>(std::move(sub_solutions), cost);
216 }
217 
218 SubTrajectoryPtr Connect::merge(const std::vector<robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryConstPtr>& sub_trajectories,
219  const std::vector<planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr>& intermediate_scenes,
220  const moveit::core::RobotState& state) {
221  // calculate cost
222  double cost = 0;
223  for (const auto& trajectory : sub_trajectories) {
224  if (!trajectory)
225  continue;
226  for (const double& distance : trajectory->getWayPointDurations())
227  cost += distance;
228  }
229 
230  // no need to merge if there is only a single sub trajectory
231  if (sub_trajectories.size() == 1)
232  return std::make_shared<SubTrajectory>(sub_trajectories[0], cost);
233 
234  auto jmg = merged_jmg_.get();
235  assert(jmg);
236  robot_trajectory::RobotTrajectoryPtr trajectory = task_constructor::merge(sub_trajectories, state, jmg);
237  if (!trajectory)
238  return SubTrajectoryPtr();
239 
240  // check merged trajectory for collisions
241  if (!intermediate_scenes.front()->isPathValid(*trajectory,
242  properties().get<moveit_msgs::Constraints>("path_constraints")))
243  return SubTrajectoryPtr();
244 
245  return std::make_shared<SubTrajectory>(trajectory, cost);
246 }
